verses.name: Isaiah 13:15
verses.text: Every one that is found shall be thrust through; and every one that is joined unto them shall fall by the sword.

verses.name: Isaiah 13:16
verses.text: Their children also shall be dashed to pieces before their eyes; their houses shall be spoiled, and their wives ravished.

verses.name: Isaiah 13:17
verses.text: Behold, I will stir up the Medes against them, which shall not regard silver; and as for gold, they shall not delight in it.

verses.name: Isaiah 13:18
verses.text: Their bows also shall dash the young men to pieces; and they shall have no pity on the fruit of the womb; their eye shall not spare children.
